analysis.description:
Crowdsale.requiredSignedAddress (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#283-285) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- investWithCustomerId (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#445-454)
	- invest (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#456-470)
	- setRequireCustomerId (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#522-525)

Crowdsale.signerAddress (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#286-288) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- setRequireCustomerId (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#522-525)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#490-505):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#502-505)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#505)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#381-437):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#389-403)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#404-407)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#423-427)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#421-423)
SafeMath.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#49-59) shadows built-in symbol "assert"

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.Crowdsale (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#330-370):
	External calls:
	- setPricingStrategy(_pricingStrategy) (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#351-357)
	State variables written after the call(s):

	- multisigWallet (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#357)
	- startsAt (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#365-366)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#381-437):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#389-403)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#404-407)

Reentrancy in TapcoinPricing.setCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#722-731):
	External calls:
	- ! _crowdsale.isCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#724-728)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsale (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#728-731)

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#589-617) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#600-617)
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#607-617)

Crowdsale.requiredSignedAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0x98d0d19faced5aa18b67c927b33b04ec27e264d3.sol#283-285)
